quotes.quote: No throne in the world can substitute a beach chair.
Kindness and faithfulness keep a king safe, through kindness his throne is made secure.
A throne is only a bench covered with velvet.
It is more honorable to be raised to a throne than to be born to one. Fortune bestows the one, merit obtains the other.
The road may be rough, the journey may be tough and the experience may be bitter, but they are stepping stones to our future thrones.
No king has a throne more beautiful than a bench covered with the autumn leaves!
Some smart man once said that on the most exalted throne in the world, we are seated on nothing but our own arse.
What is a throne? A chair; ornamented but a poisonous chair!
On the highest throne in the world, we still sit only on our own bottom.
I swear to you sitting a throne is a thousand times harder than winning one.
Among those who share a throne there can be no loyalty; Dominion's ever impatient consort.
A family on the throne is an interesting idea. It brings down the pride of sovereignty to the level of petty life.
It was not a comfortable Throne, this seat made of stone. But power was not supposed to be comfortable.
Truth forever on the scaffold, wrong forever on the throne.
On the throne, one has many worries; and remorse is the one that weighs the least.
A true king is neither husband nor father; he considers his throne and nothing else.
An imaginary throne is more glorious than a mat of house.
You can build a throne with bayonets, but you can't sit on it for long.
